meaning: discipline, conduct oneself well, study, master

onyomiExamples.meaning: pursuit of knowledge, studying, learning, training, completing a course
pursuit of knowledge, studying, learning, training, completing a course
holding a memorial service for oneself, an older person conducting a memorial service for a deceased, younger person

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to study, to complete (a course), to cultivate, to master, to order (one's life), to repair (a fault one has committed)
to reform (oneself), to conduct oneself well
